thinking: My task is to go to the large tree near the garage. I see the garage in the center of my view and a large tree on the right-hand side. I need to get closer to that area, so I will move forward.

I have moved closer. The garage is now slightly on the left-hand side, and the large tree I need to reach is on the right-hand side. I need to continue moving towards the tree. I'll move forward again.

I've advanced further. The garage is now clearly on the left-hand side. The large tree, my target, is still on the right-hand side. To face it more directly for approach, I need to turn towards it. I will turn right.
After turning, the large tree is now mostly centered in my view. The garage is on the left-hand side. I need to get closer to the tree, so I will move forward.
I am closer to the large tree, which remains centered in my view. The garage is further on the left-hand side. I need to continue approaching the tree. I will move forward.

I have moved very close to the target tree. Its base is mostly centered, but slightly obscured by foliage on the left-hand side. The main trunk appears slightly to the right of center. To better center the tree trunk and ensure I've reached it properly, I will turn slightly to the right.

I have turned slightly. The large tree trunk is now clearly centered right in front of me, and I am standing at its base. I have successfully reached the large tree near the garage as instructed. I will finish the task.
